Class SimplePanel

Direct Known Subclasses:
SimpleModelPanel, SimpleScrollingPanel
public class SimplePanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel

Although there are plenty of ways to use the drawlet framework, it may not be apparent without some examples. Here is a very simple one which provides a basic DrawingTool.

See Also:
